availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Graves (Russell County, KY, 1st sgt & 1st Lieut 1st Ky Cav USA)

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky, soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Benjamin W. Graves and Margaret Graves. Resident in Russell County in 1850. Served in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first sergeant and first lieutenant from September 20, 1861, to December 31, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, District 1, p. 230B.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 32-33.
